It belongs to the Solanaceae family, which includes other well-known plants like tomatoes and peppers. The plant is characterized by its small, bell-shaped flowers that bloom at night, attracting specific pollinators. Due to its restricted distribution and ecological significance, it is considered a rare and vulnerable species.
